zhou.gloss: the imperial dynasty of China from 1122 to 221 BC

zhou dynasty.gloss: the imperial dynasty of China from 1122 to 221 BC

zhu jiang.gloss: a river in southeast China that flows into the South China Sea

zhukov.gloss: Soviet general who during World War II directed the counteroffensive at Stalingrad and relieved Leningrad and captured Berlin (1896-1974)
